vidis.util.graphs.graph
Class NetworkImpl

java.lang.Object
  vidis.util.graphs.graph.GraphImpl
      vidis.util.graphs.graph.WeightedGraphImpl
          vidis.util.graphs.graph.NetworkImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Graph, Network, WeightedGraph
public class NetworkImpl
extends WeightedGraphImpl
implements Network

This class implements the Network interface as a directed, weighted graph with a source and a sink vertex.

Version:
1.0 2002-10-12
Author:
Ralf Vandenhouten
See Also:

Method Detail

setSource

public void setSource(Vertex sourceVertex)
               throws GraphException
Sets the source vertex of the Network. The Vertex specified must already be in the Network. Otherwise, a NoSuchVertexException is returned.

Specified by:
setSource in interface Network
Throws:
GraphException

setSink

public void setSink(Vertex sinkVertex)
             throws GraphException
Sets the sink vertex of the Network. The Vertex specified must already be in the Network. Otherwise, a NoSuchVertexException is returned.

Specified by:
setSink in interface Network
Throws:
GraphException

getSource

public Vertex getSource()
Returns the current source of the Network. It is possible that this method will return null if the Network is empty.

Specified by:
getSource in interface Network

getSink

public Vertex getSink()
Returns the current sink of the Network. It is possible that this method will return null if the Network is empty.

Specified by:
getSink in interface Network

addEdge

public WeightedEdge addEdge(Vertex v1,
                            Vertex v2,
                            double capacity)
                     throws Exception
Convenience method to add a WeightedEdge with a specified (non-negative) network capacity into the WeightedGraph. The default addEdge( v1, v2 ) will add a WeightedEdge with zero capacity, after which you can call setWeight() to specify the capacity.

Specified by:
addEdge in interface Network
Specified by:
addEdge in interface WeightedGraph
Overrides:
addEdge in class WeightedGraphImpl
Returns:
The WeightedEdge that has been added.
Throws:
Exception
